name: Pirated Code (Demo)
description:
This game features:

  • A NB/B story with one love interest (Dex)
  • 2.5k+ words
  • 2 endings (1 good (to be continued), 1 bad)
Content Warning_

This game contains:

  • Mild swearing
  • Screenshakes
  • Flashing images
Social Media_

If you want to see more of my art or game dev stuff, you can find me on Twitter and Tumblr.

If you like the game and want to support me, please consider leaving a tip here on itch (via the download  button) or on my Ko-fi! 

 Another non-monetary way you can show your support is by leaving a review! It really helps the game's visibility.

Credits_
  • This game was made by HitOrMissy for NaNoRenO 2021!
  • Music by Cyberleaf Studio.
  • Sound Effects from Game Master Audio and ZapSplat.
  • UI Assets from D.F.Y. Studio.
  • Special thanks to the giant adult baby (you know who you are).
